snippet.title: Pro Evolution Soccer PES 2013 Wii Trailer
snippet.description:
April 24, 2012 12:19 PM - Pro Evolution Soccer 2013 (PES 2013) has been announced for the Nintendo Wii. There is not a release day yet. 
PES 2012 was the best Soccer game on Wii (Sorry Fifa). PES on Wii has already great controls. If the people of Konami could only upgrade the graphics engine PES 2013 would be awesome. 
As soon as there is more information or a release date for the game I will update the news.

Visit my channel at http://www.youtube.com/user/josegruiz80?feature=mhee for more Wii and Wii U News, Trailers, Reviews, and More.
DON'T FORGET TO SUBSCRIBE!
